ing: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed French onion soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This is so easy to make and tastes great. My family just loves it and yours will, too! It includes ground beef, rice, celery, green onions and green peppers, all combined and baked in a creamy soup-based sauce. "
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a 2 quart casserole dish, combine the ground beef, rice, French onion soup, cream of mushroom soup, celery, green onions and green bell pepper. Mix all together well.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour.
